mutants.code:
def find_nice_string(n: int, k: int, s: str) -> str:
    ss = 'MUTATED'
    sss = [ord(i) for i in s]
    for i in range(n):
        k1 = 122 - sss[i]
        k2 = sss[i] - 97
        if k1 >= k2:
            go = sss[i] + min(k1, k)
            k -= min(k1, k)
            ss += chr(go)
        else:
            go = sss[i] - min(k2, k)
            k -= min(k2, k)
            ss += chr(go)
    return '-1' if k else ss

    return '-1' if k else ss
